solution_line_template: The opera house has {num_rows} x {seats_per_row} = <<{num_rows}*{seats_per_row}={total_seats}>>{total_seats} seats.
There are {total_seats} x {percentage_not_taken} = <<{total_seats}*{percentage_not_taken}={seats_not_taken}>>{seats_not_taken} seats that were not taken.
The total number of seats taken was {total_seats} - {seats_not_taken} = <<{total_seats}-{seats_not_taken}={seats_taken}>>{seats_taken}.
Therefore, the opera house earned ${ticket_cost} x {seats_taken} = $<<{ticket_cost}*{seats_taken}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} from one of the shows.
